Visit.name: Visit
Visit.description: Represents information about a visit that a manager schedules for a field rep to perform, usually at distributor, supplier, and partner locations.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the visit.

ActualVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit ended.

ActualVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit started.

AddressId.description: The address associated with the visit.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the visit.

InstructionDescription.description: Special instructions provided by a manager that the visitor refers to during a visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The location of the supplier, distributor, or partner where the visit must be conducted.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the visit record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the visit record owner.

ParentVisitId.description: The parent visit associated with the current visit.

PlaceId.description: ID of the place that the visitor visits.

PlannedVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit is expected to end.

PlannedVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit is expected to start.

Status.description: The status of the visit. Visitors canâ€™t edit this field.

StatusRemarks.description: The reasons for abandoning or completing the visit as provided by the visitor.

UserId.description: The user associated with the visit.

VisitTypeId.description: The type of visit such as inspection type, or work type.

VisitorId.description: The name of the person visiting the place.
